description:
Vovsoft Batch Video Upscaler is a powerful Windows software that enhances and enlarges videos using AI technology.

Vovsoft Batch Video Upscaler is a powerful Windows software that enhances and enlarges videos using AI technology. Designed for simplicity and performance, it runs entirely offline without requiring any external dependencies. Thanks to Vulkan-based acceleration, it works seamlessly with Intel, AMD, and Nvidia graphics cards. It supports popular file formats, including MP4 and AVI, and allows you to process multiple videos in bulk, saving you time and effort.

Key Features
- AI-Powered Upscaling: Enlarges videos up to 2x their original size with improved sharpness and detail.
- GPU-Accelerated Performance: Leverages Vulkan driver for seamless compatibility with Intel, AMD, and Nvidia GPUs. No additional dependencies like CUDA or Python are required.
- All-in-One Package: Includes all necessary binaries and pre-trained models, making installation and portable usage hassle-free.
- Fully Offline Operation: Runs entirely on your local device, ensuring your files remain private and secure. No data is sent to the internet.
- Batch Processing: Convert multiple videos in a single run with minimal effort.
